channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 两年多来，购物者在沃尔玛的每次消费首次减少
item.description: Shoppers are spending less per trip to Walmart for the first time in over two years on.wsj.com/3wn6aTP on.wsj.com/3wn6aTP

item.title: 比机器人审核简历更糟糕的是什么？根本没人看。
item.description: What’s worse than a robot vetting your résumé? Nobody reading it at all. on.wsj.com/3SJn06P on.wsj.com/3SJn06P

item.title: 街谈巷议：过去几年，全球能源市场一直在坐过山车。在其他市场遭受重创时，印度却几乎乐在其中。
item.description: Heard on the Street: Global energy markets have been on a roller coaster for the past few years. While others have been thrown for a loop, India is almost enjoying the ride. on.wsj.com/3UKgjny on.wsj.com/3UKgjny

item.title: 沃尔玛已达成以 23 亿美元收购智能电视制造商 Vizio 的协议，这项交易将为这家零售巨头带来更多数据和平台，以销售广告空间。
item.description: Walmart has struck a deal to buy smart TV maker Vizio for $2.3 billion, a deal that would bring the retail giant more data and platforms in which to sell advertising space on.wsj.com/49ld3ne on.wsj.com/49ld3ne

item.title: 观看：乌克兰官员称俄罗斯在前线使用了数千个星链终端。以下是我们对埃隆-马斯克的卫星系统工作原理的了解。
item.description: Watch: Ukrainian officials say Russia has been using thousands of Starlink terminals on the front lines. Here’s what we know about how Elon Musk’s satellite system works. on.wsj.com/3uBEom1 on.wsj.com/3uBEom1

item.title: 街谈巷议制药公司斥资数十亿美元开发能像制导导弹一样瞄准癌症的药物
item.description: Heard on the Street: Pharmaceutical companies are spending billions of dollars to develop drugs that can target cancer like guided missiles on.wsj.com/3I6N2fq on.wsj.com/3I6N2fq

item.title: 一位生物技术公司的高管买入了另一家制药公司的股票期权，赚取了 12 万美元的意外之财。美国证券交易委员会现在说他犯了内幕交易罪。
item.description: A biotech executive bought options on another drug company’s stock—and earned a windfall of $120,000. The SEC now says he committed insider trading. on.wsj.com/3T5dNas on.wsj.com/3T5dNas

item.title: 今年以来，个人投资者已向英伟达股票净投入 12 亿美元。我们来认识一下其中的一些人。
item.description: Individual investors have poured a net $1.2 billion into Nvidia shares this year. Meet some of them. on.wsj.com/3URHNbb on.wsj.com/3URHNbb

item.description: A growing gray market for Ozempic is posing a regulatory conundrum in a country with a serious obesity problem (Hint: It isn’t the U.S.) on.wsj.com/3wffXLt on.wsj.com/3wffXLt

item.title: 俄罗斯法院维持对《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）的拘留。
item.description: A Russian court upheld the detention of Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, whom the U.S. government deems to be wrongfully detained on.wsj.com/3uwtZbl on.wsj.com/3uwtZbl

item.title: 吉安尼斯-安特托孔波被公认为世界上最好的篮球运动员之一，他谈到了第一次访问父母的故乡尼日利亚、不喝咖啡以及因其关于失败的演讲而走红的经历
item.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo, widely regarded as one of the best basketball players in the world, talks about visiting his parents’ native Nigeria for the first time, not drinking coffee and going viral for his speech on failure on.wsj.com/3IpZgjz on.wsj.com/3IpZgjz

item.title: 巴克莱银行削减了成本，并表示将致力于增加英国的零售和商业贷款，此后该行股价上涨了约 5%。
item.description: Barclays shares rose around 5% after the bank slashed costs and said it would pivot toward growing retail and business lending in the U.K. on.wsj.com/3SD6g12 on.wsj.com/3SD6g12

item.title: 马瑙斯是亚马逊地区的一个大都市，这里的一位企业家正在探索如何带领游客深入丛林，亲眼目睹保护雨林的艰巨性。
item.description: An entrepreneur in Manaus, a sprawling metropolis in the Amazon, is on a quest to take travelers deeper into the jungle to see for themselves what’s at stake in protecting the rainforest on.wsj.com/3wj7sz6 on.wsj.com/3wj7sz6

item.title: 医生说，三明治中的火腿片要三思而后行
item.description: Think twice about that sliced ham in your sandwich, doctors say on.wsj.com/3I2QKXg on.wsj.com/3I2QKXg

item.title: 男人穿什么最性感（和最不性感）？我们对 2000 名男性和女性进行了调查。剧透远离红色。
item.description: What are the sexiest (and least sexy) things men can wear? We surveyed 2,000 men and women. Spoiler: Stay away from red. on.wsj.com/3HZqb5m on.wsj.com/3HZqb5m

item.title: 与朋友一起旅行听起来似乎很有趣，但它可能会导致各种意想不到的冲突，包括财务冲突。以下是经验丰富的专家介绍的正确做法。
item.description: Traveling with friends might sound fun on paper but it can lead to all kinds of unexpected conflicts, including financial ones. Here's how to do it right, according to seasoned experts. on.wsj.com/3OJL20k on.wsj.com/3OJL20k

item.title: 从餐厅预订到最佳通勤路线，聊天机器人门房很快就会为我们打点好生活中的各种安排，但他们需要小费
item.description: Chatbot concierges will soon take care of lots of life's arrangements for us, from restaurant reservations to the best routes for commuting—but they'll expect tips on.wsj.com/3uKx1si on.wsj.com/3uKx1si

item.title: 今冬最受追捧和模仿的外套不是普通的大衣。它是一件 "scoat"。
item.description: The most coveted and copied jacket this winter isn’t just any coat. It’s a “scoat.” on.wsj.com/3ONdJtr on.wsj.com/3ONdJtr

item.title: 您的猫咪被困在树上了吗？爬树专家会用绳索、安全带和猫咪悄悄话来解决猫咪的不幸。"拉尔菲，为什么不让我来帮你呢，伙计？"
item.description: Is your cat stuck in a tree? Expert tree climbers will come out to fix feline misadventures—with ropes, harnesses and cat whispering. “Ralphie, why don’t you let me help you, buddy?” on.wsj.com/3OFZ0jW on.wsj.com/3OFZ0jW

item.title: 十年前，在比弗利伍德花二三十万美元就能买到一栋房子。现在呢？"你不可能以低于300万美元的价格买到任何一条黄金街道上的地皮"。
item.description: A decade ago, you could buy a house in Beverlywood for $200,000 to $300,000. Now? “You can’t buy just land on any of the prime streets for less than $3 million.” on.wsj.com/4bwWRkl on.wsj.com/4bwWRkl

item.title: 以下是《华尔街日报》头版的早期报道
item.description: Here is an early look at the front page of The Wall Street Journal on.wsj.com/48nHBTO

item.title: 中国人民银行表示，中国主要银行将住房贷款基准利率--五年期贷款最优惠利率下调至 3.95% 的新低。这一降幅远远超出了经济学家的预期。
item.description:
The People’s Bank of China said that the country's major banks reduced the five-year loan prime rate, a benchmark for home loans, to a new low of 3.95%. It was a much bigger reduction than economists had expected. on.wsj.com/3uBpLz9

on.wsj.com/3uBpLz9

item.title: 雷切尔-戈德堡-波林（Rachel Goldberg-Polin）的儿子赫什（Hersh）于 10 月 7 日被绑架，此后家人一直没有他的消息。她成了释放人质的倡导者"我需要我的儿子"
item.description:
Rachel Goldberg-Polin’s son, Hersh, was kidnapped on Oct. 7 and his family has had no word of him since. She's become an advocate for the release of hostages. "I need my son." on.wsj.com/49ieOS7

on.wsj.com/49ieOS7

item.title: 在过去的一年里，沙特阿拉伯一直是华而不实的支出计划的传送带--而这一切都变得相当昂贵
item.description:
Saudi Arabia has been a conveyor belt of flashy spending plans over the past year—and it’s all getting rather expensive on.wsj.com/3URy98t

on.wsj.com/3URy98t

item.title: 关于通货膨胀、国内生产总值和劳动力市场的几份备受瞩目的经济报告都显示出了经济的火热，但许多经济学家都在淡化这些惊喜
item.description:
A handful of high-profile economic reports on inflation, GDP and the labor market have shown a hot economy, but many economists are playing down these surprises on.wsj.com/49mc8mp

on.wsj.com/49mc8mp
